description:
What is it?

Holland & Barrett Vitamin D3 contributes towards the maintenance of normal bones, muscle function and the immune system.

  • Supports the Normal Function of The Immune System
  • Contributes To the Maintenance of Normal Bones and Muscle Function
  • Suitable For Vegetarians

What Are the Benefits of This Supplement?

  • Vitamin D is one of the body’s most important vitamins, helping it with a variety of tasks: Vitamin D contributes to the normal function of the immune system and is very important for the body’s structural system, maintaining normal bone and muscle function. Vitamin D3 also contributes to the normal absorption and utilisation of calcium and phosphorus.
  • When exposed to sunlight, our bodies will naturally make vitamin D3. This process happens when ultraviolet B (UVB) radiation from the sun triggers the 7-dehydrocholesteol to produce D3. Research suggests that everyone over the age of one years should have a daily intake of at least 10µg of Vitamin D per day to protect bone and muscle health. Government advice is that everyone should consider taking a daily vitamin D supplement, especially during the autumn and winter.

What Are the Benefits of This Supplement?

description:
• An essential amino acid, meaning it cannot be produced by the body on its own
  • 1000mg of L-Lysine per tablet
  • Suitable for vegans and vegetarians

A building block for protein, lysine is an essential amino acid, meaning that it cannot be produced by the body alone.

L-Lysine is the form of lysine our bodies can easily make use of and that is why it is important that we find a dietary source.

While meats such as chicken and beef, plus soybeans and pumpkin seeds are sources of L-Lysine, if you feel you may not be getting enough, lysine supplements, such as this Holland & Barrett lysine 1000mg tablet, can help.

Because L-Lysine is found in some of its highest levels in meat and dairy produce, it can be particularly challenging for those who do not eat animal products to naturally consume.

Suitable for vegans and vegetarians, these L-Lysine supplements should only be purchased by those over 18 years of age.

Why do I need L-Lysine?

Proteins are made from long chains of 20 smaller molecules known as amino acids. Working alongside other amino acids, lysine amino acid helps the body to build protein.

And why do we need protein? Because it makes up the structure of all cells and tissues in our bodies, including muscle tissue, internal organs, tendons, skin, hair and nails. It is pretty important stuff.

A lack of L-Lysine can result in difficulty concentrating, fatigue and irritability. L-Lysine for skin and stress

Lysine’s involvement in collagen production leads researchers to think that it may have positive benefits for the skin.

Research suggests that keeping blood L-Lysine levels steady by taking a supplement can even help to reduce the occurrence of cold sores in those prone to the pesky little blighters.

Lysine may also aid those suffering with stress and anxiety. Supplementing with this vital substance appears to reduce levels of cortisol, the stress hormone, and may be particularly helpful for those suffering from high levels of stress.

L-Lysine versus Arginine

Not all amino acids are created equal. In fact the amino acid arginine can feed viruses, causing us to fall ill more easily when our immune system is low.

L-Lysine is Arginine’s arch enemy because it blocks Arginine activity. This process can help us to defend against illnesses such as ear infections. It also supports L-Lysine’s ability to tackle cold sores.

Packaging colour and size may vary but product contents is as described.
name: PE Nutrition L-Lysine

name: HRI Cold & Flu Echinacea 30 Tablets

description:
A remedy as old as time, elderberry is one of the most often and longest used medicinal plants in the world.

Prized by ancient Egyptians as a skin care formula and burn healer, and used by Native American tribes as a cure for rheumatism and fever, elderberry is still collected and used in European folk medicine to this very day.

We now know that the bark, leaves and raw berries of the elderberry tree can cause nasty stomach issues - in fact the bark of sambucus nigra has traditionally been used as a diuretic, a laxative and to induce vomiting.

Which is why elderberries are most commonly processed into safe, palatable supplements, such as this Sambucol black elderberry liquid, packed full of vitamin C and zinc for immune system support and to ease the symptoms of fatigue.

Suitable for vegetarians, this great tasting extra strength formula also contains Antivirin for immunity.

Black elderberry: packed with nutrients

A low-calorie berry full of friendly antioxidants, the elderberry is a good source of phenolic acids, potent compounds that can help reduce oxidative stress in the human body.

Oxidative stress happens when your body experiences an imbalance of free radicals and antioxidants. Free radicals can be formed when the body is exposed to stressors such as smoke, poor diet, pollution and pesticides. Free radical damage can result in a variety of illnesses and cause premature aging.

Antioxidants such as those found in black elderberry liquid can help to combat oxidative stress, supporting good all-round health and immunity.

Sambucol elderberry liquid: a cold and flu warrior

Sambucol Extra Defence is manufactured using a uniquely effective process.

In fact, this manufacturing process means that Sambucol liquid is the only product currently on the market, that maintains the powerful properties of the elderberry’s innate Antivirin.

A good friend for your immune system, Antivirin coats viruses, limiting their ability to infect healthy cells and reducing their replication. This makes it easier for defensive white blood cells to remove the virus from the body.

With Sambucol ingredients, including powerful Antivirin, flu-busting vitamin C and zinc, on your side, your body has the tools it requires to help it to stand up to colds and flu.

So potent are the properties of elderberry, that research has shown that taking an elderberry syrup can improve symptoms of influenza up to four times faster.

When should I take Sambucol Extra Defence?

Any time your immune system needs a helping hand, reach for your bottle of elderberry extract.

During winter, when damp, cold weather is combined with warm centrally heated homes, giving colds and the flu their favourite spreading conditions, Sambucol Extra Defence can provide extra protection.

Take in advance or at the first signs of a cold to ward off the seasonal sniffles.

Sambucol products can also help see off back to school bugs, give your immunity to a helping hand when you are stressed and rundown before or after a big event and when you are travelling and exposed to a multitude of bugs in airports, on transport and in air conditioned public spaces.
name: Sambucol Extra Defence Black Elderberry Liquid 120ml

Pukka quality and sustainability
